Description: For sale is a 2012 Ernie Ball Music Man Family Reserve John Petrucci BFR 6 in a beautiful KOA with original case and COA. This guitar is in excellent condition and in perfect working order. There are some light scratches a a couple small dings, and that is it. Overall, I would give it a solid 9 out of 10 condition. Everything on the guitar is original. There are no cracks, repairs, or issues. The neck is straight with no issues. The original frets are in excellent condition with no wear. The original case works great. SPECS: Nut Width: 1.67" 1st Fret: .75" 12th Fret: .82" Neck Type: Thin Finger Board: Ebony Pickups: Dimarzio Liquifire/Crunch Lab Weight: 8 lb 6 oz If you scroll all the way down to the bottom of the pictures you can see detailed pictures of the frets, any wear on the guitar, and the guitar taken apart.
